keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for essential improvements at the local hospital and defending NHS staff.

issues.health: Campaigning for essential improvements at our local hospital. We are the many, not the few. Defend our NHS!
issues.socialWelfare: Looking After Our Older People â€” believes that older people have made and still make a huge contribution to society. Our loved ones should be treated to a good life in their old age with dignity, respect, and access to high-quality services.

housing.content: Fighting for investment in local infrastructure before expansion.
